description: Infrastructure is a specification for cloud provider infrastructure.

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description:
Specification of the Infrastructure.
If the object's deletion timestamp is set, this field is immutable.

class.description: Class holds the extension class used to control the responsibility for multiple provider extensions.

providerConfig.description: ProviderConfig is the provider specific configuration.

region.description: Region is the region of this infrastructure. This field is immutable.

secretRef.description: SecretRef is a reference to a secret that contains the cloud provider credentials.

name.description: name is unique within a namespace to reference a secret resource.

namespace.description: namespace defines the space within which the secret name must be unique.

sshPublicKey.description: SSHPublicKey is the public SSH key that should be used with this infrastructure.

type.description: Type contains the instance of the resource's kind.

status.description: InfrastructureStatus is the status for an Infrastructure resource.

conditions.description: Conditions represents the latest available observations of a Seed's current state.

items.description: Condition holds the information about the state of a resource.

codes.description: Well-defined error codes in case the condition reports a problem.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

lastUpdateTime.description: Last time the condition was updated.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the transition.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

egressCIDRs.description:
EgressCIDRs is a list of CIDRs used by the shoot as the source IP for egress traffic. For certain environments the egress
IPs may not be stable in which case the extension controller may opt to not populate this field.

lastError.description: LastError holds information about the last occurred error during an operation.

codes.description: Well-defined error codes of the last error(s).

description.description: A human readable message indicating details about the last error.

lastUpdateTime.description: Last time the error was reported

taskID.description: ID of the task which caused this last error

lastOperation.description: LastOperation holds information about the last operation on the resource.

description.description: A human readable message indicating details about the last operation.

lastUpdateTime.description: Last time the operation state transitioned from one to another.

progress.description: The progress in percentage (0-100) of the last operation.

state.description: Status of the last operation, one of Aborted, Processing, Succeeded, Error, Failed.

type.description: Type of the last operation, one of Create, Reconcile, Delete, Migrate, Restore.

networking.description: Networking contains information about cluster networking such as CIDRs.

nodes.description: Nodes are the CIDRs of the node network.

pods.description: Pods are the CIDRs of the pod network.

services.description: Services are the CIDRs of the service network.

nodesCIDR.description:
NodesCIDR is the CIDR of the node network that was optionally created by the acting extension controller.
This might be needed in environments in which the CIDR for the network for the shoot worker node cannot
be statically defined in the Shoot resource but must be computed dynamically.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the most recent generation observed for this resource.

resources.description: Resources holds a list of named resource references that can be referred to in the state by their names.

items.description: NamedResourceReference is a named reference to a resource.

resourceRef.description: ResourceRef is a reference to a resource.

apiVersion.description: apiVersion is the API version of the referent

kind.description: kind is the kind of the referent; More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

name.description: name is the name of the referent; More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names

state.description: State can be filled by the operating controller with what ever data it needs.
